item.title: How to use Markdown
item.description: This will teach you how to use Markdown :grin: Markdown is a plaintext language that allows users to make HTML like webpages with no coding required These markdown files are simple and easy to make, which make them great for blogs, personal websites, cookbooks, and manifestos alike! Bold to make a word bold, Simply surround each side of a word with (**) a double asterisk Here is an **Example** Here is an Example
